channel.title: CVE Feed for softaculous -- FileOrganizer – Manage WordPress and Website Files
channel.description: The latest CVEs for softaculous -- FileOrganizer – Manage WordPress and Website Files

item.title: CVE-2024-5599|2024-06-07T16:54:21.164Z -- softaculous -- fileorganizer%20%E2%80%93%20manage%20wordpress%20and%20website%20files
item.description: The FileOrganizer – Manage WordPress and Website Files plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.7 via the 'fileorganizer_ajax_handler' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including backups or other sensitive information if the files have been moved to the built-in Trash folder.

item.title: CVE-2024-5599|2024-06-07T12:33:43.953Z -- softaculous -- fileorganizer%20%E2%80%93%20manage%20wordpress%20and%20website%20files
item.description: The FileOrganizer – Manage WordPress and Website Files plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.7 via the 'fileorganizer_ajax_handler' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including backups or other sensitive information if the files have been moved to the built-in Trash folder.
